Sub - Class in shaharas
The Sub class represents the subtraction operator ('-') in an expression evaluator system.
Sub() - Constructor for class shaharas.Sub
Default constructor that initializes the subtraction operator with: - A left operand 'A' of 0
Sub(int) - Constructor for class shaharas.Sub
Constructor that allows initializing the left operand 'A' with a specific integer.

The SubEQL class represents the subtraction assignment operator ('-=') in an expression evaluator system.

SubOneLeft - Class in shaharas
The SubOneLeft class represents the pre-decrement operator (--variable) in an expression evaluator system.

SubOneRight - Class in shaharas
The SubOneRight class represents the post-decrement operator (variable--) in an expression evaluator system.
